channel.title: Protobuf on Ding's Coding Forge
channel.description: Recent content in Protobuf on Ding's Coding Forge

item.title: [EDA] Schema Registry
item.description: People often underestimate the importance of documenting schemas before starting to code, especially when working with stream processing. In this post, I’ll explain why using a schema registry is essential and why designing schemas upfront is crucial before diving into coding.

item.title: [Protocol] RPC... 그리고 GRPC 톺아보기
item.description: 흔히들 (나만 그럴지도..?) rpc 통신을 한다 하면… HTTP/2 기반의 protocol Buffer를 사용하겠구나~ (grpc 구나) 라고 생각하기 마련이다. rpc는 무엇이고 grpc는 어째서 빠를까? 그리고 왜 사용할까?
